federal_authority.title: Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA)
federal_authority.scope: Governs accuracy, permissible purpose, and use of consumer data.
relevance_to_ccri: DMV/DOT enforcement data is not a permissible credit purpose.
Unlawful state enforcement cannot enter a consumer report.
Adverse action notices must state true reasons for denial.
Data must be relevant, timely, and non-discriminatory.

federal_authority.title: Equal Credit Opportunity Act (ECOA)
federal_authority.scope: Prohibits discrimination in any aspect of credit.
relevance_to_ccri: DMV-based denials yield unlawful disparate impact.
License status cannot be used as a proxy for protected classes.
Gating access to credit violates equal treatment guarantees.

federal_authority.title: Truth in Lending Act (TILA)
federal_authority.scope: Requires clear disclosure of APR, finance charges, OTD pricing.
relevance_to_ccri: DMV-based risk pricing violates disclosure requirements.
Hidden risk algorithms break APR accuracy.
OTD pricing must reflect true, lawful costs.

federal_authority.title: RESPA — Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act
federal_authority.scope: Governs mortgage servicing, escrow, foreclosure practices.
relevance_to_ccri: Foreclosure actions must follow federal sequencing.
Improper DMV-based classification can taint servicing decisions.

federal_authority.title: FTC Holder Rule
federal_authority.scope: Lenders inherit liability for dealer misrepresentation.
relevance_to_ccri: Illegal dealer gatekeeping = lender liability.
False 'license required by law' claims violate federal rules.

federal_authority.title: FTC UDAP (Unfair or Deceptive Acts or Practices)
relevance_to_ccri: Inflated fees and fake requirements violate UDAP.
DMV-based coercion is an unfair practice.

federal_authority.title: Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (FDCPA)
relevance_to_ccri: Wrongful repossession based on unlawful DMV data is illegal.
Collection cannot rely on unconstitutional state actions.

federal_authority.title: Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (SCRA)
federal_authority.scope: Protects active duty service members in credit and repossession.
relevance_to_ccri: DMV-based denials may violate SCRA protections.
Repossession requires additional federal safeguards.

federal_authority.title: DOT/FMCSA Statutes
federal_authority.scope: Regulates commercial motor vehicles, not general citizens.
relevance_to_ccri: DMV/DOT enforcement cannot be used on noncommercial applicants.
CCRI must detect unlawful blending of CMV and civilian populations.

federal_authority.title: Federal Preemption & Supremacy
federal_authority.scope: Federal law overrides state laws and administrative practices.
relevance_to_ccri: State-created licensing barriers cannot supersede federal credit law.
DMV-based credit rules violate supremacy when contradictory.
